item.title: How to build and host a website with Hugo
item.description: This is a concise, step-by-step guide on how to build a website - just like this one - with Hugo, and host it on Github. Follow the steps and check out the hyperlinks for a quick explanation on each component. Some explanations Link to heading Essentially, any website (and in fact most software) is just a folder with a bunch of text files “organized in a precise way”. In this context, terms such as “Hugo project”, “Git repo”, or “root directory” all refer to the same folder: your future website.
